price: En büyük dehşet dahi onları tasalandırmaz. Melekler kendilerini şöyle karşılar: İşte bu size vâdedilmiş olan (mutlu) gününüzdür.
arabic: لَا يَحۡزُنُهُمُ ٱلۡفَزَعُ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ هَٰذَا يَوۡمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yaḥzunuhumu al-fazaʿu al-akbaru watatalaqqāhumu al-malāikatu hādhā yawmukumu alladhī kuntum tūʿadūna
